import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Box from '@mui/material/Box'; import TextField from '@mui/material/TextField'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from "axios"; const DrugInputs = () => { const [values, setValues] = useState({ drugname: "", drugcategory: "", quantity: "", dateadded: "", expirydate: "" }) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:3306/druginput", values).then(res => (console.log(res))).catch(err => console.log(err)); } return (
:not(style)': { m: 1, width: '25ch' },}}noValidate autoComplete="off"> :not(style)': { m: 1, width: '25ch' },}}noValidate autoComplete="off" > :not(style)': { m: 1, width: '25ch' },}}noValidate autoComplete="off" >
